amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase the authorization level in the bill for Data Transparency from $1 million to $250 million per year from 2016 through 2019.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part B of House Report 114-37 to authorize $250 million for each of fiscal years 2016 through 2019.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Edwards amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 164 - 254 (Roll no. 122).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Ms. Edwards.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Edwards amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 164 - 254 (Roll no. 122).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
